paper_abstract: In this paper, we deal with the problem of uniqueness and weighted sharing of two meromorphic functions with their first derivatives sharing a nonzero polynomial with the same multiplicities. The result in this paper improve those given by K. Tohge, Xiao- Min Li & Hong-Xun Yi, I. Lahiri & P. Sahoo. (c) 2008 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Further results on weighted sharing of values for meromorphic functions
